meanings.definition: A cordwainer is a person who makes shoes out of leather.
meanings.sent1: The cordwainers in the town handcraft beautiful leather shoes.
meanings.sent2: I bought a pair of handmade shoes from the cordwainers at the market.
meanings.sent3: The cordwainers decided to have a race to see who could make the fastest shoe.
meanings.sent4: Her hands moved like cordwainers, shaping the leather with precision.
meanings.sent5: The smell of leather filled the workshop where the cordwainers worked diligently.

meanings.definition: Cordwainers are skilled craftsmen who specialize in making high-quality footwear.
meanings.sent1: Many people admire the cordwainers for their expertise in crafting shoes.
meanings.sent2: The cordwainers showcased their latest designs at the shoe expo.
meanings.sent3: The cordwainers' shoes were so good, even the birds wanted a pair.
meanings.sent4: In the world of shoemaking, the cordwainers were like artists creating masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The cordwainers' reputation for quality spread far and wide.

meanings.definition: The cordwainers in the village are known for their expertise in shoemaking.
meanings.sent1: Every year, the cordwainers host a shoe-making competition in the village.
meanings.sent2: The cordwainers' shop is always busy with customers seeking custom-made shoes.
meanings.sent3: The cordwainers' secret ingredient for perfect shoes turned out to be magic dust.
meanings.sent4: The cordwainers' hands moved swiftly, turning leather into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The village's prosperity was in part due to the cordwainers' exceptional skills.
